snippet.title: Velocibeasts is a VR PvP arena brawler where you move by throwing your weapons
snippet.description: We talk to the developer of Velocibeasts about how they rethought movement and why esports will be important to VR.

localized.title: Velocibeasts is a VR PvP arena brawler where you move by throwing your weapons
localized.description: We talk to the developer of Velocibeasts about how they rethought movement and why esports will be important to VR.
